meanings.definition: The selling of goods in large quantities to be retailed by others.
meanings.sent1: The wholesales of fruits to supermarkets help keep prices low for customers.
meanings.sent2: The company specializes in wholesales of electronics to local stores.
meanings.sent3: At the market, the wholesales of candy bars made the kids' eyes light up with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the wholesales of flowers in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The wholesales of books filled the shelves with endless stories waiting to be read.

meanings.definition: To sell in large quantities for resale.
meanings.sent1: The farmer wholesales his produce to grocery stores in the city.
meanings.sent2: She wholesales handmade jewelry to boutiques across the country.
meanings.sent3: The magician wholesales his tricks to other performers for a good price.
meanings.sent4: His words wholesales hope to those in need of encouragement.
meanings.sent5: The artist wholesales her paintings to galleries around the world.
